title: TERRAINGRID_ACTIVATE
content:
0xA356990E161C9E650xA1CB6C94// TerraingridActivate
void TERRAINGRID_ACTIVATE(BOOL toggle);Parameters:toggle: Enables or disables the golf putting grid display.This native enables/disables the gold putting grid display (https://i.imgur.com/TC6cku6.png).
This requires these two natives to be called as well to configure the grid: TERRAINGRID_SET_PARAMS and TERRAINGRID_SET_COLOURS.
